 It takes no deal off the table

html: #EpidermolysisBullosa (EB) is a group of genetic skin conditions which cause the skin to blister and tear at the slightest touch. There is currently no known cure for EB. Our work is focused on funding research to change this, while also supporting people living with EB. #FightEB
